summary: ROOMMATES is the third part of a 4 horror movie series, FOUR HORROR TALES. Roommates Yoo-jin, Eun-soo, Bo-ram, and Da-young are cramming for a college entrance exam. It's difficult for them... See full summary »
cast: Jung-in Choi|Jin-yong Heo|Joo-ryeong Kim|Eun-seong Lee|Kim Ri-na|Yeong-jin Sin|Ho-rin Yoo|Da-kyeong Yoon
title: Eoh-neu-nal-gap-ja-gi D-Day
